War Mage Artius: We think that what the soldiers saw might have been a monster called Banshee Queen Enira. If so, that would be a dangerous enemy. In can create fear using Floating Zombies and Floating Skulls. Still, experienced soldiers shouldn't be reduced to a gaggle of frightened children! If I weren't needed here to safeguard the Barrier Orb, I'd go deal with this myself. Since I can't go, I need a skilled adventurer. How about it?
